produk.spesifikasi:
AMD Ryzen 7 5800HS Creator Edition (8C / 16T, 3.2 / 4.4GHz, 4MB L2 / 16MB L3)
NVIDIA GeForce MX450 2GB GDDR6
Chipset: AMD SoC Platform
Memory: 16GB Soldered LPDDR4x-4266
Memory Slots: Memory soldered to systemboard, no slots, dual-channel
Max Memory: 16GB soldered memory, not upgradable
Storage: 1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0x4 NVMe
Storage Support: One drive, up to 1TB M.2 2280 SSD
Card Reader: None
Optical: None
Audio Chip: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC3306 codec
Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, Dolby Atmos, HARMAN-branded
Camera: IR & 720p + ToF Sensor
Microphone: 2x, Array
Battery: Integrated 61Wh
Power Adapter: 5W USB-C (3-pin)
Display: 14" 2.8K (2880x1800) IPS 400nits Glossy, 90Hz, 100% sRGB, Glass, Dolby Vision
Touchscreen: None
Keyboard: Backlit, English
Surface Treatment: Anodizing Sandblasting
Case Material: Aluminium (Top), Glass (Display Cover), Aluminium (Bottom)
Dimensions (WxDxH): 312.4 x 221.4 x 14.6-16.9 mm (12.29 x 8.72 x 0.57-0.67 inches)
Weight: 1.4 kg (3.09 lbs)
Operating System: Windows 11 Home 64, English

Ethernet: None
WLAN + Bluetooth: 11ax, 2x2 + BT5.1
Standard Ports:
2x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort 1.4)
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On)

Monitor Cable: None
Security Chip: Firmware TPM 2.0
Fingerprint Reader: None
Other Security: IR camera for Windows Hello

☑ Processor : AMD Ryzen 7 5800H (8C / 16T, 3.2 / 4.4GHz, 4MB L2 / 16MB L3)
☑ RAM : 16GB Soldered DDR4-3200
☑ Storage : 512 GB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe 3.0x4 NVMe
☑ VGA : NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 712 / 1057MHz, TGP 35W
☑ Display : 16" WQXGA (2560x1600) IPS 350nits Anti-glare, 60Hz, 100% sRGB
☑ Sistem Operasi : Windows 11 Home 64bit + Microsoft Office Home & Student 2021
☑ Warna : Cloud Grey / Storm Grey
☑ Kamera : IR & 720p + ToF Sensor
☑ Audio : Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Dolby Atmos

Antarmuka :
- 1x Card reader
- 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
- 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (Always On)
- 1x HDMI 1.4b
- 1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
- 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0 and DisplayPort 1.4)

☑ Keyboard : Backlit
☑ Bluetooth® 5.1
☑ WLAN: WiFi 6 802.11AX (2 x 2)
☑ Battery : Integrated 75Wh
☑ Adapter : 135W Slim Tip

☑ Dimensi : 356 x 251 x 16.9-18.4 mm
☑ Berat : 1.9 kg
